message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You started with a fair offer, but I can do better!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get a bit more. Your turn, Bob!
I'm not budging on the ratio, but I'm willing to give you less overall.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating. This is my final offer.
